page.title: 17Vine Products
page.content: Vine Products is a factory that blends and bottles wine. When we first arrived at the factory we were taken to see the large vats that hold upto 2000 gallons of wine or sherry. The vats were made of American oak, fibre glass or stainless steel. We then moved on to see the blending vats these vats hold up to 250,000 gallons of wine that are being blended together. The wine is then bottled and labelled. The crates of wine have a sheet of polythene put over the top of them and are then sent into an oven, this melts the polythene into the shape of the bottle top. The bottles then go to a storeroom. From here the wine is loaded onto lorries and is sent to all parts of Britain .
